title: How to set the TTY mode?
answer:
Enter the “Menu->Settings->TTY” to set the TTY mode. 

 TTY Off mode: The standard voice speaking mode and the listening mode. This is the default setting. 

 TTY Full mode: Transmit and receive the TTY characters. 

 HCO (hearing carry over) mode: Transmit TTY characters but receive by listening to the 

 receiver. 

 VCO (voice carry over) mode: Receive TTY characters but transmit by speaking into the 

 Speaker.
